event.title: Flappy Bird in MonoGame, Hands On Session with Phil Trelford
event.description:
!!!Important!!! 
The date for this meetup has changed to September.

Hopefully this should be the final re-arrangement. September 29th should be the final date :)

This is a hands on session, where you adapt your own version of Flappy Bird. No prior experience of F# or games programming is required. Please bring along a laptop with F# installed.

Getting F# Installed: 
http://fsharp.org/use/windows/
http://fsharp.org/use/mac/

Alternatively use Atom/VSCode with Ionide!:
http://ionide.io/
